description: Resource Type definition for SSO assignmet

InstanceArn.description: The sso instance that the permission set is owned.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The sso instance that the permission set is owned.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 10  

Maximum Length: 1224  

Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):sso:::instance/(sso)?ins-[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{16}  

Update requires: No interruption

TargetId.description: The account id to be provisioned.
TargetId.markdownDescription:
The account id to be provisioned.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: \d{12}  

Update requires: No interruption

TargetType.description: The type of resource to be provsioned to, only aws account now
TargetType.markdownDescription:
The type of resource to be provsioned to, only aws account now

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

PermissionSetArn.description: The permission set that the assignemt will be assigned
PermissionSetArn.markdownDescription:
The permission set that the assignemt will be assigned

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 10  

Maximum Length: 1224  

Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):sso:::permissionSet/(sso)?ins-[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{16}/ps-[a-zA-Z0-9-./]{16}  

Update requires: No interruption

PrincipalType.markdownDescription:
The assignee's type, user/group

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

PrincipalId.description: The assignee's identifier, user id/group id
PrincipalId.markdownDescription:
The assignee's identifier, user id/group id

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 47  

Pattern: ^([0-9a-f]{10}-|)[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}$  

Update requires: No interruption
